casebody.data:
IN RE: James Allen HILL No. 224P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. James Allen Hill, For Hill, James Allen. Ben R. David, District Attorney.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 10th of June 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Pender County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of June 2019."
